remarks: The union of two sets that are strictly dominated by the infinite set ` X ` is also dominated by ` X ` .  This version of ~ infunsdom assumes additionally that ` A ` is the smaller of the two.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Dec-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2015.)
statement: infunsdom1 $p |- ( ( ( X e. dom card /\ _om ~<_ X ) /\ ( A ~<_ B /\ B ~< X ) ) -> ( A u. B ) ~< X ) $.
